comments.body: so what is the extra error that showed up here?
I fixed an issue in https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/pull/19452/commits/967a426fe1d175a3cbfa0211df96e020a593507e where we were losing some deferred global diagnostics.

When we would call `sortAndDeduplicateDiagnostics` we would sort the diagnostics in place: https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/commit/967a426fe1d175a3cbfa0211df96e020a593507e#diff-66cec844e251a1918deb897eabca206bL1856

After changing that to sort into a new array, I found that we had a few cases where we would modify the sorted array when adding deferred diagnostics. This was the fix: https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/commit/967a426fe1d175a3cbfa0211df96e020a593507e#diff-942ae3cd2a8bbd85ed86a60cd7c43307R2324
